name: Janitor 2
description:
Game written for the Beansjam '22.

The topic was: "wir müssen wach bleiben" (we have to stay awake)

In this game you take the control over Hans the Janitor. He needs to stay awake, while his 8 hour nightshift. That is freakin' boring, because he has nothing to do. Everything he has are some sheeps around him. And they want only one thing: beeing counted by Hans. 

So this is where your job starts. Defend Hans. Destroy everything that wants you to bring you the sweet sweet sleep.
